text: I love Pizza Hut but this place sucks! They forgot my soda and the sauce with my cheese bread. That's not even the worst part. On top of that the creepy delivery driver kept flirting with me. Then when I called the store almost two hours â€¦More

text: I've ordered several times from this location and each time the food is slightly under cooked. Also the wing and pizza sauces have a different taste than the other Pizza Huts I have ordered from.
